beer.beer_description: We invited our new mates Verdant Brewing from Cornwall in the UK, to come down under, soak up the Aussie Summer sun and brew a beer that celebrates how our love of haze and hops brought us together. Manageable is a hazy IPA brewed with Citra, Motueka and Galaxy hops from the latest Hop Harvest, creating a tropical blend bursting with fresh berries, passionfruits and mangoes.

items.checkin_comment: Five Nights at Freddy’s and beer. Pretty decent IPA, very hazy but as the name suggests, “manageable”. No overpowering notes at all, pretty solid all round

beer.beer_description: We invited our new mates Verdant Brewing from Cornwall in the UK, to come down under, soak up the Aussie Summer sun and brew a beer that celebrates how our love of haze and hops brought us together. Manageable is a hazy IPA brewed with Citra, Motueka and Galaxy hops from the latest Hop Harvest, creating a tropical blend bursting with fresh berries, passionfruits and mangoes.

items.comment: Try the Kowloon Tap Room in Kowloon

items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that have been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 6! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Manageable by Mountain Culture x Verdant collab wow on tap this brew rocks hard so good cheers

user.bio:
Lover of Craft Beer 
Brisbane | Australia

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 145 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.checkin_comment: Pretty nice drop, with lots of tropical fruits comming through, however the flavour doesn't have enough depth, the beer feels very light.

So, 6.2% is ‘manageable’ now it seems.
I’m not going to complain 😀.
Collab with Verdant Brewing from Cornwall in England. Nice drop.
